review: Bought my first ROKU in 2009 (and it's still in use.) Have since added two of these Streaming Sticks and bought another one as a gift. Cut my cable bill in half over five years ago and have saved about $4800. We rarely watch "regular" TV anymore - ROKU is so much better!

review: Great product at a very reasonable price. I would highly recommend buying refurbished. The stick is already the cheapest of the Roku models so if you're in the market for the Roku Stick you're obviously looking for a budget streaming device. I don't know about all refurbished products, but with regards to the one I received from DealFisher through Amazon, I cannot tell it isn't brand new! Save even more and don't be afraid to try refurbished.
